meanings.sent1: She always misregisters the time for our meetings.

meanings.definition: A mistake in registering or recording.
meanings.sent1: The misregisters in the system caused confusion among the employees.
meanings.sent2: He found several misregisters in the logbook that needed correction.
meanings.sent3: The misregisters in the report made it look like a comedy of errors.
